== Command list of pichi bot ==
 * *!log n* - Show log of messages
 * *!wtf name* - show definition from db-wiki
 * *!dfn name=val* - set definition to db-wiki
 * *!set name=val* - set pichi option
 * *!gc [name]* - show avalible options
 * *!users [nick|jid]* - show users list
 * *!msg [nick|jid]* message - send message from bot to user
 * *!ping [nick|jid]* - ping request to user
 * *!join room nick [status]* - join room (or change nick)
 * *!left room nick [status]* - left room
 * *!quit* - quit :)
 * *!version* - show version of bot

=== admin commands: ===
!set, !gc, !msg, !join, !left, !quit
